import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Card,Button,Table}from"react-bootstrap";import{assessmentService}from"../services/api";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AssessmentManagement=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[assessments,setAssessments]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchAssessments();},[]);const fetchAssessments=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const response=await assessmentService.getAllAssessments();setAssessments(response.data||[]);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching assessments:",error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleViewAssessment=assessmentId=>{navigate("/assessment/edit/".concat(assessmentId));};const handleDeleteAssessment=async assessmentId=>{if(window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this assessment?")){try{await assessmentService.deleteAssessment(assessmentId);fetchAssessments();// Refresh the list
}catch(error){console.error("Error deleting assessment:",error);}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Header,{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"mb-0",children:"Assessment Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:()=>navigate("/assessment/create"),children:"Create Assessment"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner-border text-primary",role:"status",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"visually-hidden",children:"Loading..."})})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{responsive:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Course"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Max Score"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Questions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:assessments.map(assessment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:assessment.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:assessment.courseName||"Full Stack Web D."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:assessment.maxScore}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:assessment.questions?typeof assessment.questions==="string"?"".concat(JSON.parse(assessment.questions).length," questions"):"".concat(assessment.questions.length," questions"):"2 questions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",size:"sm",onClick:()=>handleViewAssessment(assessment.assessmentId),children:"View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"danger",size:"sm",onClick:()=>handleDeleteAssessment(assessment.assessmentId),children:"Delete"})]})})]},assessment.assessmentId))})]})})]});};export default AssessmentManagement;
